articles.title: Exclusive: Australia's former top doctor and cancer survivor backs new push to save lives - 9News
articles.description: When Chris Baggoley was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer last year, he knew exactly the battle he was facing- because he used to be Australia's top doctor.
